Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: Set LOD
Rule.Text: ThisApplication.ActiveDocument.ComponentDefinition.RepresentationsManager.LevelofDetailRepresentations("ilogic").Activate ThisApplication.ActiveDocument.ComponentDefinition.RepresentationsManager.DesignViewRepresentations("ilogic").Activate iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone=True 'ThisApplication.ActiveView.Fit

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: INPUTS
Rule.Text:
Sub Main() Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "WallThk") = wall_thickness DoorAcrovyn() FrameAcrovyn() DoorAction()
iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True End Sub
Sub DoorAcrovyn() Select Case door_finish Case "Acrovyn" DoorAcrovynThk = acrovyn_thickness Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorAcrovynThk") = acrovyn_thickness Case "Lacquered" DoorAcrovynThk = 0.01 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorAcrovynThk") = 0.01 Case "Unfinished" DoorAcrovynThk = 0.01 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorAcrovynThk") = 0.01 End Select End Sub
Sub FrameAcrovyn() Select Case Mid(dim_spec,1,1) Case "O" Select Case frame_finish Case "Acrovyn" Component.IsActive("FRAME ACROVYN ASSY") = True FrameAcrovynThk = acrovyn_thickness Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameAcrovynThk") = acrovyn_thickness Case "Lacquered" Component.IsActive("FRAME ACROVYN ASSY") = False FrameAcrovynThk = 0.01 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameAcrovynThk") = 0.01 Case "Unfinished" Component.IsActive("FRAME ACROVYN ASSY") = False FrameAcrovynThk = 0.01 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameAcrovynThk") = 0.01 End Select End Select
End Sub
Sub DoorAction() Select Case Mid(dim_spec,1,1) Case "O" If Mid(door_configuration,Len(door_configuration)-1,2) = "OP" Then OverPanel = "Yes" Else OverPanel = "No" End If End Select
End Sub

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: SIZES
Rule.Text:
Sub Main() Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameT") = frame_thickness-acrovyn_thickness Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap") = 1.5+DoorAcrovynThk Select Case dim_spec Case "O" SidePanel = "No" O() Case "F" SidePanel = "No" F() Case "OD1" OD1() SidePanel = "No" Case "OD1+SP" SidePanel = "Yes" OD1SP() Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelSplit") = SidePanelHeight Case "OD2" SidePanel = "No" OD2() Case "OD2+SP" SidePanel = "Yes" OD2SP() Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelSplit") = SidePanelHeight Case "OD12+SP" SidePanel = "Yes" OD12SP() Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelSplit") = SidePanelHeight Case "FD1" SidePanel = "No" FD1() Case "FD2" SidePanel = "No" FD2() Case "D1" SidePanel = "No" D1() Case "D2" SidePanel = "No" D2() Case "D12" SidePanel = "No" D12() End Select
If Mid(dim_spec,1,1) = "O" Then SidePanelState() DoorHeight() End If
If Mid(dim_spec,1,2) = "OD" Then Select Case OverPanel Case "No" SidePanelFullHeight() Case "Yes" SidePanelHt() End Select DoorHeight() End If 'If door_finish = "Acrovyn" Then 'RuleParametersOutput() 'ThisDoc.Document.Rebuild() 'End If
door_height = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True End Sub
Sub O() Component.IsActive("FRAME ASSY") = True Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = ((struct_opening_width - (2*frame_thickness)-10)/2)+acrovyn_thickness- FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = ((struct_opening_width - (2*frame_thickness)-10)/2)+acrovyn_thickness- FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") 'Calc Door Widths Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDoorW") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") - DoorGap - Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap") - DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") - DoorGap - Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap") - DoorAcrovynThk 'Over Panel Length Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") DoorHeight()
Case "LH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = False 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = struct_opening_width -((DoorGap/2)+frame_thickness+FrameAcrovynThk) - 10 - (frame_thickness+FrameAcrovynThk)+acrovyn_thickness Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = (DoorGap/2)+acrovyn_thickness Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") 'Calc Door Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDoorW") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") - DoorGap - Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap") - DoorAcrovynThk 'Over Panel Length Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") DoorHeight()
Case "RH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = (DoorGap/2)+acrovyn_thickness Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = (struct_opening_width -((DoorGap/2)+frame_thickness+FrameAcrovynThk) - 10 - (frame_thickness+FrameAcrovynThk))+acrovyn_thickness Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") 'Calc Door Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") - DoorGap - Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap") - DoorAcrovynThk 'Over Panel Length Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") DoorHeight() End Select 'NoOverPanel() End Sub
Sub F() OverPanel = "No" SidePanel = "No" 'NoOverPanel() Component.IsActive("FRAME ASSY") = False
Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = (frame_opening_width)/2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = (frame_opening_width)/2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") 'Calc Door Widths Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDoorW") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") - DoorGap - Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap") - DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") - DoorGap - Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap") - DoorAcrovynThk 'Door Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") = frame_opening_height - DoorBottomGap-DoorGap
Case "LH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = False 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = frame_opening_width -(DoorGap/2) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = (DoorGap/2) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") 'Calc Door Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDoorW") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") - DoorGap - Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap") - DoorAcrovynThk 'Door Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") = frame_opening_height - DoorBottomGap-DoorGap
Case "RH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = (DoorGap/2) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = frame_opening_width -(DoorGap/2) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") 'Calc Door Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") - DoorGap - Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap") - DoorAcrovynThk 'Door Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") = frame_opening_height - DoorBottomGap-DoorGap End Select
End Sub
Sub OD1() Component.IsActive("FRAME ASSY") = True ' This is for the RHC Door Size Input Select Case door_handing Case "UNPR RH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = (struct_opening_width - 10 - door_leaf1_width-DoorGap-(Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap"))-(2*(frame_thickness+FrameAcrovynThk))+DoorAcrovynThk)+ FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = (door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+(Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")))-DoorAcrovynThk+ FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") 'Calc Door Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = door_leaf1_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDoorW") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC")- DoorGap-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk 'Over Panel Length Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") DoorHeight() End Select End Sub
Sub OD1SP() Component.IsActive("FRAME ASSY") = True ' This is for the RHC Door Size Input Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Calc Frame Width Dim spdelta0 = (((struct_opening_width - 10 - (2*(frame_thickness)))/2)-(door_leaf1_width + DoorGap+(Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk)))-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert")-FrameAcrovynThk+DoorAcrovynThk Select Case SidePanelSide Case "Both" 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = ((struct_opening_width - (2*(frame_thickness+FrameAcrovynThk))-10)/2)+ FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = ((struct_opening_width - (2*(frame_thickness+FrameAcrovynThk))-10)/2)+ FrameAcrovynThk 'Calc Door Widths Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDoorW") = door_leaf1_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = door_leaf1_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) door_leaf2_width = door_leaf1_width 'Calc Door Stop Position Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk 'Side Panel Length Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPLength") = spdelta0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelLH") = spdelta0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelRH") = spdelta0 Case "LH" 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = (door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk)+(2*spdelta0)+(2*(Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert"))) 'Calc Door Widths Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDoorW") = door_leaf1_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = door_leaf1_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) door_leaf2_width = door_leaf1_width 'Calc Door Stop Position Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk 'Side Panel Length Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPLength") = (2*spdelta0)+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelLH") = (2*spdelta0)+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelRH") = (2*spdelta0)+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert") Case "RH" 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = (door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk)+(2*spdelta0)+(2*(Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert"))) 'Calc Door Widths Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = door_leaf1_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDoorW") = door_leaf1_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) door_leaf2_width = door_leaf1_width 'Calc Door Stop Position Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk 'Side Panel Length Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPLength") = (2*spdelta0)+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelLH") = (2*spdelta0)+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelRH") = (2*spdelta0)+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert") End Select
Case "RH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Calc Frame Width Dim spdelta1 = (struct_opening_width-(door_leaf1_width+(2*(DoorGap+FrameAcrovynThk+DoorAcrovynThk+frame_thickness))+10))/2 'Side Panel Length Select Case SidePanelSide Case "Both" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = spdelta1 +(DoorGap/2)+DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = spdelta1 +door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = DoorGap-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")+DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk 'Calc Door Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = door_leaf1_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) door_leaf2_width = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame")-DoorGap-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-spdelta1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPLength")= spdelta1-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert")+DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelLH") = spdelta1-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert")+DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelRH") = spdelta1-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert")+DoorAcrovynThk Case "RH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = (2*spdelta1) +(DoorGap/2)+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = DoorGap-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")+DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk 'Calc Door Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = door_leaf1_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) door_leaf2_width = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame")-DoorGap-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-spdelta1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPLength")=(2*spdelta1)-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert")+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelRH") = (2*spdelta1)-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert")+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "LH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = (DoorGap/2) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = (2*spdelta1) +door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")+DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = DoorGap-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")+DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk 'Calc Door Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = door_leaf1_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) door_leaf2_width = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame")-DoorGap-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-spdelta1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPLength")=(2*spdelta1)-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert")+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelLH") = (2*spdelta1)-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert")+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) End Select End Select
End Sub
Sub OD2() Component.IsActive("FRAME ASSY") = True ' This is for the RHC Door Size Input Select Case door_handing Case "UNPR LH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = (struct_opening_width - 10 - door_leaf2_width-DoorGap-(Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap"))-(2*(frame_thickness+FrameAcrovynThk))+DoorAcrovynThk)+FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = (door_leaf2_width+DoorGap+(Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")))-DoorAcrovynThk+FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") 'Calc Door Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDoorW") = door_leaf2_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC")- DoorGap-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk 'Over Panel Length Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") End Select End Sub
Sub OD2SP() Component.IsActive("FRAME ASSY") = True ' This is for the LHC Door Size Input Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Calc Frame Width Dim spdelta0a = (((struct_opening_width - 10 - (2*(frame_thickness)))/2)-(door_leaf2_width + DoorGap+(Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk)))-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert")-FrameAcrovynThk+DoorAcrovynThk Select Case SidePanelSide Case "Both" 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = ((struct_opening_width - (2*(frame_thickness+FrameAcrovynThk))-10)/2)+FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = ((struct_opening_width - (2*(frame_thickness+FrameAcrovynThk))-10)/2)+FrameAcrovynThk 'Calc Door Widths Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDoorW") = door_leaf2_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = door_leaf2_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) door_leaf1_width = door_leaf2_width 'Calc Door Stop Position Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = door_leaf2_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = door_leaf2_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk 'Side Panel Length Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPLength") = spdelta0a Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelLH") = spdelta0a Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelRH") = spdelta0a Case "RH" 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = door_leaf2_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = (door_leaf2_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk)+(2*spdelta0a)+(2*(Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert"))) 'Calc Door Widths Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = door_leaf2_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDoorW") = door_leaf2_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) door_leaf1_width = door_leaf2_width 'Calc Door Stop Position Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = door_leaf2_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = door_leaf2_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk 'Side Panel Length Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPLength") = (2*spdelta0a)+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelRH") = (2*spdelta0a)+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelLH") = (2*spdelta0a)+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert") Case "LH" 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = door_leaf2_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = (door_leaf2_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk)+(2*spdelta0a)+(2*(Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert"))) 'Calc Door Widths Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDoorW") = door_leaf2_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = door_leaf2_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) door_leaf1_width = door_leaf2_width 'Calc Door Stop Position Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopLHC") = door_leaf2_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopRHC") = door_leaf2_width+DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk 'Side Panel Length Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPLength") = (2*spdelta0a)+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelRH") = (2*spdelta0a)+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelLH") = (2*spdelta0a)+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPVert") End Select

Sub FD1() ' This is for the RHC Door Size Input SidePanel = "No" OverPanel = "No" Component.IsActive("FRAME ASSY") = False Select Case door_handing Case "UNPR RH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Calc Frame Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") = (frame_opening_width - door_leaf1_width -DoorGap-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap"))+DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") = (door_leaf1_width+DoorGap+(Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")))-DoorAcrovynThk 'Calc Door Width Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDoorW") = door_leaf1_width-(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDoorW") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame")- DoorGap-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk 'Door Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") = frame_opening_height - DoorBottomGap-DoorGap End Select End Sub

Sub DoorHeight() Select Case frame_finish Case "Acrovyn" Select Case OverPanel Case "Yes" Component.IsActive("FRAME OVER PANEL ASSY") = True 'Component.IsActive("OVER PANEL ACROVYN ASSY") = True YesOverPanel() Case "No" Component.IsActive("FRAME OVER PANEL ASSY") = False 'Component.IsActive("OVER PANEL ACROVYN ASSY") = False NoOverPanel() End Select Case "Lacquered" Select Case OverPanel Case "Yes" Component.IsActive("FRAME OVER PANEL ASSY") = True YesOverPanel() Case "No" Component.IsActive("FRAME OVER PANEL ASSY") = False NoOverPanel() End Select Case "Unfinished" Select Case OverPanel Case "Yes" Component.IsActive("FRAME OVER PANEL ASSY") = True YesOverPanel() Case "No" Component.IsActive("FRAME OVER PANEL ASSY") = False NoOverPanel() End Select End Select End Sub
Sub NoOverPanel() Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelHt") = 300 Component.IsActive("FRAME OVER PANEL ASSY") = False If frame_finish="Acrovyn" Then Component.IsActive("OVER PANEL ACROVYN ASSY") = False End If Select Case dim_spec Case "O" 'Calc Frame Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameH") = struct_opening_height - DoorBottomGap-DoorGap Case "FD1" 'Calc Frame Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameH") = frame_opening_height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopTop") = frame_opening_height 'Calc Door Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") = frame_opening_height -DoorBottomGap-DoorGap Case "FD2" 'Calc Frame Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameH") = frame_opening_height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopTop") = frame_opening_height 'Calc Door Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") = frame_opening_height -DoorBottomGap-DoorGap
End Select End Sub
Sub YesOverPanel() Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelHt") = struct_opening_height - 9 - frame_thickness - FrameAcrovynThk-door_height-DoorGap-DoorBottomGap-61 Component.IsActive("FRAME OVER PANEL ASSY") = True If frame_finish="Acrovyn" Then Component.IsActive("OVER PANEL ACROVYN ASSY") = True End If Select Case dim_spec Case "O" 'Calc Frame Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameH") = struct_opening_height - 9 - frame_thickness - FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopTop") = door_height+DoorGap+DoorBottomGap 'Calc Door Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") = door_height 'Acrovyn Height Case "F" 'Calc Frame Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameH") = struct_opening_height - 9 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopTop") = door_height+DoorGap+DoorBottomGap 'Calc Door Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") = door_height Case "OD1" 'Calc Frame Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameH") = struct_opening_height - 9 - frame_thickness - FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopTop") = door_height+DoorGap+DoorBottomGap 'Calc Door Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") = door_height Case "OD1+SP" 'Calc Frame Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameH") = struct_opening_height - 9 - frame_thickness - FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopTop") = door_height+DoorGap+DoorBottomGap 'Calc Door Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") = door_height Case "OD2" 'Calc Frame Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameH") = struct_opening_height - 9 - frame_thickness - FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopTop") = door_height+DoorGap+DoorBottomGap 'Calc Door Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") = door_height Case "OD2+SP" 'Calc Frame Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameH") = struct_opening_height - 9 - frame_thickness - FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopTop") = door_height+DoorGap+DoorBottomGap 'Calc Door Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") = door_height Case "OD12+SP" 'Calc Frame Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "FrameH") = struct_opening_height - 9 - frame_thickness - FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopTop") = door_height+DoorGap+DoorBottomGap 'Calc Door Height Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorHeight") = door_height End Select End Sub
Sub SidePanelState() Select Case frame_finish Case "Acrovyn" Select Case SidePanel Case "No" Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("SIDE PANEL LH ACROVYN ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("SIDE PANEL RH ACROVYN ASSY") = False Case "Yes" Select Case SidePanelSide Case "Both" Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("SIDE PANEL LH ACROVYN ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("SIDE PANEL RH ACROVYN ASSY") = True Case "LH" Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("SIDE PANEL LH ACROVYN ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("SIDE PANEL RH ACROVYN ASSY") = False Case "RH" Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("SIDE PANEL LH ACROVYN ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("SIDE PANEL RH ACROVYN ASSY") = True End Select End Select Case "Lacquered" Select Case SidePanel Case "No" Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY") = False Case "Yes" Select Case SidePanelSide Case "Both" Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY") = True Case "LH" Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY") = False Case "RH" Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY") = True End Select End Select Case "Unfinisehed" Select Case SidePanel Case "No" Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY") = False Case "Yes" Select Case SidePanelSide Case "Both" Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY") = True Case "LH" Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY") = False Case "RH" Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY") = True End Select End Select End Select End Sub
Sub SidePanelHt() Select Case OverPanelWidth Case "Full" Select Case SidePanelSide Case "Both" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelH") = door_height + DoorBottomGap + DoorGap Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame") Case "LH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelH") = door_height + DoorBottomGap + DoorGap Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame")'-FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame")' -FrameAcrovynThk Case "RH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelH") = door_height + DoorBottomGap + DoorGap Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelLHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCFrame")'-FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelRHC") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCFrame")' -FrameAcrovynThk End Select Case "Partial" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelH") = struct_opening_height - frame_thickness - 9 - FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelLHC") = door_leaf2_width + DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelRHC") = door_leaf1_width + DoorGap+Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MidDoorGap")-DoorAcrovynThk End Select
End Sub
Sub SidePanelFullHeight() door_height = struct_opening_height - 9 - frame_thickness - FrameAcrovynThk - DoorGap - DoorBottomGap Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelH") = door_height + DoorBottomGap + DoorGap
End Sub

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: FINISH
Rule.Text:
Sub Main() DoorHanding() iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True End Sub
Sub DoorHanding() Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" 'Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True Select Case door_finish Case "Acrovyn" YesDoorAcrovynLH() YesDoorAcrovynRH() Case "Lacquered" NoDoorAcrovynLH() NoDoorAcrovynRH() Case "Unfinished" NoDoorAcrovynLH() NoDoorAcrovynRH() End Select Case "LH" 'Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = False Select Case door_finish Case "Acrovyn" YesDoorAcrovynLH() Case "Lacquered" NoDoorAcrovynLH() Case "Unfinished" NoDoorAcrovynLH() End Select Case "RH" 'Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = False 'Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True Select Case door_finish Case "Acrovyn" YesDoorAcrovynRH() Case "Lacquered" NoDoorAcrovynRH() Case "Unfinished" NoDoorAcrovynRH() End Select Case "UNPR LH" 'Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True Select Case door_finish Case "Acrovyn" YesDoorAcrovynLH() YesDoorAcrovynRH() Case "Lacquered" NoDoorAcrovynLH() NoDoorAcrovynRH() Case "Unfinished" NoDoorAcrovynLH() NoDoorAcrovynRH() End Select Case "UNPR RH" 'Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True 'Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True Select Case door_finish Case "Acrovyn" YesDoorAcrovynLH() YesDoorAcrovynRH() Case "Lacquered" NoDoorAcrovynLH() NoDoorAcrovynRH() Case "Unfinished" NoDoorAcrovynLH() NoDoorAcrovynRH() End Select End Select End Sub
Sub YesDoorAcrovynLH() Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY") = True End Sub
Sub YesDoorAcrovynRH() Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY") = True End Sub
Sub NoDoorAcrovynLH() Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY") = False End Sub
Sub NoDoorAcrovynRH() Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY") = False End Sub

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: DOORS
Rule.Text:
Sub Main() DoorTCalc() If door_thickness > CalcDoorThickness Then DoorCoreTCalc() If door_thickness <= CalcDoorThickness Then Fire_Rating() Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorCoreThk") = DoorCoreT
If door_finish = "Acrovyn" Then DoorStyleAcro() Else DoorStyleNoAcro() End If
Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorH") = door_height
iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True iLogicVb.RunRule("FINISH COLOUR") End Sub
Sub Fire_Rating() Select Case fire_rating Case "FD30" DoorCoreT = 44 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "intumescent") = 2 Case "FD30S" DoorCoreT = 44 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "intumescent") = 2 Case "FD60" DoorCoreT = 54 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "intumescent") = 3 Case "FD60S" DoorCoreT = 54 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "intumescent") = 3 Case "NFR" DoorCoreT = 44 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "intumescent") = 1 End Select End Sub
Sub DoorTCalc() Select Case door_type Case "DT01" CalcDoorThickness = DoorCoreT+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT02" CalcDoorThickness = DoorCoreT+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT03" CalcDoorThickness = DoorCoreT+(4*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT04" CalcDoorThickness = DoorCoreT+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT05" CalcDoorThickness = DoorCoreT+(4*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT06" CalcDoorThickness = DoorCoreT+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT07" CalcDoorThickness = DoorCoreT+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT08" CalcDoorThickness = DoorCoreT+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT09" CalcDoorThickness = DoorCoreT+(4*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT10" CalcDoorThickness = DoorCoreT+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT11" CalcDoorThickness = DoorCoreT+(4*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT12" CalcDoorThickness = DoorCoreT+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) End Select End Sub
Sub DoorCoreTCalc() Select Case door_type Case "DT01" DoorCoreT = door_thickness -(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT02" DoorCoreT = door_thickness -(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT03" DoorCoreT = door_thickness -(4*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT04" DoorCoreT = door_thickness -(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT05" DoorCoreT = door_thickness -(4*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT06" DoorCoreT = door_thickness -(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT07" DoorCoreT = door_thickness -(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT08" DoorCoreT = door_thickness -(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT09" DoorCoreT = door_thickness -(4*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT10" DoorCoreT = door_thickness -(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT11" DoorCoreT = door_thickness -(4*DoorAcrovynThk) Case "DT12" DoorCoreT = door_thickness -(2*DoorAcrovynThk) End Select End Sub
Sub DoorStyleAcro() Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" DoorTypeLHAcro() DoorTypeRHAcro() Case "UNPR LH" DoorTypeLHAcro() DoorTypeRHAcro() Case "UNPR RH" DoorTypeLHAcro() DoorTypeRHAcro() Case "LH" DoorTypeLHAcro() Case "RH" DoorTypeRHAcro() End Select End Sub
Sub DoorStyleNoAcro() Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" DoorTypeLHNoAcro() DoorTypeRHNoAcro() Case "UNPR LH" DoorTypeLHNoAcro() DoorTypeRHNoAcro() Case "UNPR RH" DoorTypeLHNoAcro() DoorTypeRHNoAcro() Case "LH" DoorTypeLHNoAcro() Case "RH" DoorTypeRHNoAcro() End Select End Sub
Sub DoorTypeLHAcro() Select Case door_type Case "DT01" AcrovynFullJacketLHC() DoorGapVertLHC1() Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE LH", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE RH", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "EdgeRad") = 6 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "EdgeRad") = 6 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 4", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 5", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HardwoodWidth") = DoorCoreT Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 6") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7") = False
Case "DT02" AcrovynFullJacketLHC() DoorGapVertLHC2() Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE LH", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE RH", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "EdgeRad") = 6 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "EdgeRad") = 6 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 4", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 5", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HardwoodWidth") = DoorCoreT Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 6") = True Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7") = True Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 6", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7", "DoorBottomGap") =10+door_height-DoorAcrovynThk
Case "DT03" AcrovynSplitJacketLHC() DoorGapVertLHC1() Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE LH", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE RH", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "EdgeRad") = 9 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "EdgeRad") = 9 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HardwoodWidth") = DoorCoreT+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "Chamfer1") = True 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "Chamfer1") = True 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "Chamfer1") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "Chamfer1") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 2", "Split6") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 2", "Split7") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 3", "Split6") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 3", "Split7") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 6") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7") = False
Case "DT04" AcrovynSplitJacketLHC() DoorGapVertLHC1() Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE LH", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE RH", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "EdgeRad") = 9 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "EdgeRad") = 9 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HardwoodWidth") = DoorCoreT Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "Chamfer1") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "Chamfer1") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "Chamfer1") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "Chamfer1") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 2", "Split6") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 2", "Split7") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 3", "Split6") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 3", "Split7") = True Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 6") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7") = False
Case "DT05" DoorGapVertLHC2() AcrovynSplitJacketLHC() Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE LH", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE RH", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "EdgeRad") = 9 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "EdgeRad") = 9 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HardwoodWidth") = DoorCoreT+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "Chamfer1") = True 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "Chamfer1") = True 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "Chamfer1") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "Chamfer1") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 2", "Split6") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 2", "Split7") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 3", "Split6") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 3", "Split7") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 6") = True Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7") = True Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 6", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7", "DoorBottomGap") = 10+door_height-DoorAcrovynThk
Case "DT06" DoorGapVertLHC2() AcrovynSplitJacketLHC() Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE LH", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE RH", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "EdgeRad") = 9 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "EdgeRad") = 9 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HardwoodWidth") = DoorCoreT Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "Chamfer1") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "Chamfer1") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "Chamfer1") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "Chamfer1") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 2", "Split6") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 2", "Split7") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 3", "Split6") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 3", "Split7") = True Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 6") = True Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7") = True Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 6", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7", "DoorBottomGap") = 10+door_height-DoorAcrovynThk
Case "DT07" DoorGapVertLHC1() AcrovynFullJacketLHC() Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE LH", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE RH", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "EdgeRad") = 6 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "EdgeRad") = 6 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 4", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 5", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HardwoodWidth") = DoorCoreT Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 6") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7") = False
Case "DT08" DoorGapVertLHC2() AcrovynFullJacketLHC() Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE LH", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE RH", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "EdgeRad") = 6 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "EdgeRad") = 6 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 4", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 5", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HardwoodWidth") = DoorCoreT Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 6") = True Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7") = True Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 6", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7", "EdgeRad") = 6 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7", "DoorBottomGap") = 10+door_height-DoorAcrovynThk
Case "DT09" DoorGapVertLHC1() AcrovynSplitJacketLHC() Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE LH", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR EDGE RH", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "EdgeRad") = 9 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "EdgeRad") = 9 'Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "EdgeRad") = 9 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HardwoodWidth") = DoorCoreT+(2*DoorAcrovynThk) Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1", "Chamfer1") = True 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1A", "Chamfer1") = True 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1B", "Chamfer1") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 1C", "Chamfer1") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 2", "Split6") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 2", "Split7") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 3", "Split6") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 3", "Split7") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 6") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ACROVYN 7") = False

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: FRAME
Rule.Text:
Sub Main()
If Mid(dim_spec,1,1) = "F" Then ElseIf Mid(dim_spec,1,1) = "D" Then ElseIf Mid(dim_spec,1,1) = "O" Then Select Case frame_finish Case "Acrovyn" If frame_type = "Type A" Then AcroTypeA() If frame_type = "Type B" Then AcroTypeB() If frame_type = "Type C" Then AcroTypeC() If frame_type = "Type D" Then AcroTypeD() If frame_type = "Type E" Then AcroTypeE() If frame_type = "Type F" Then AcroTypeF() Case "Unfinished" If frame_type = "Type A" Then NoAcroTypeA() If frame_type = "Type B" Then NoAcroTypeB() If frame_type = "Type C" Then NoAcroTypeC() If frame_type = "Type D" Then NoAcroTypeD() If frame_type = "Type E" Then NoAcroTypeE() If frame_type = "Type F" Then NoAcroTypeF() Case "Lacquered" If frame_type = "Type A" Then NoAcroTypeA() If frame_type = "Type B" Then NoAcroTypeB() If frame_type = "Type C" Then NoAcroTypeC() If frame_type = "Type D" Then NoAcroTypeD() If frame_type = "Type E" Then NoAcroTypeE() If frame_type = "Type F" Then NoAcroTypeF() End Select End If
iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True iLogicVb.RunRule("FINISH COLOUR") End Sub
'#################################################
Sub AcroTypeA() FinishAdj() Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "Frame_Adj") = 57 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorAlOffset") = 12 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "AlcThk")=18 'RHC FRAME If Mid(door_configuration,1,2) = "SA" Then If Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "WallThk") - CalcDoorThickness - 0.5 - (2*FrameAcrovynThk)-57 < 12 Then Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopThk")= Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "WallThk") - CalcDoorThickness - 0.5 - (2*FrameAcrovynThk)-12 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorOffset") = (Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "WallThk")/2) Else Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopThk")= 57 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorOffset") = (Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "WallThk")/2) End If End If If Mid(door_configuration,1,2) = "DA" Then Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorOffset") = CalcDoorThickness/2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopThk")=57 End If Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1") = True Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Secondary") = True Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 2") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Base Side") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Third") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type B Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type A Fillet") = True Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Slot") = False Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4") = True Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3") = True Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3", "Long Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3", "Long Chamfer") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3", "Long") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Long Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Long Chamfer") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Long") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3", "Short Fillet") = True Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Short Fillet") = True Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 6") = False
Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type E-F") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type F") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type E-F Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Type F Move") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Type F") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH ACROVYN 1", "Type F Extrusion") = False

Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH ACROVYN 1", "Type E-F Extrusion") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH ACROVYN 1", "Type E-F") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH ACROVYN 1", "Type F Extrusion") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH ACROVYN 4", "Type F") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH ACROVYN 4", "Move Body1") = False

Sub NoAcroTypeE() FinishAdj() Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "Frame_Adj") = 57 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorAlOffset") = 12 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "AlcThk")=18 'RHC FRAME If Mid(door_configuration,1,2) = "SA" Then If Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "WallThk") - CalcDoorThickness - 0.5 - (2*FrameAcrovynThk)-57 +10-DoorAcrovynAdj< 12 Then Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopThk")= Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "WallThk") - CalcDoorThickness - 0.5 - (2*FrameAcrovynThk)+10-DoorAcrovynAdj-12 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorOffset") = ((Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "WallThk")/2)+10)-DoorAcrovynAdj Else Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopThk")= 57 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorOffset") = (Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "WallThk")/2) End If End If If Mid(door_configuration,1,2) = "DA" Then Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorOffset") = CalcDoorThickness/2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopThk")=57 End If Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1") = True Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Secondary") = True Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 2") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Base Side") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Third") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type B Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type A Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Slot") = False Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4") = True Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3") = False 'Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3", "Long Fillet") = False 'Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3", "Long Chamfer") = False 'Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3", "Long") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Long Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Long Chamfer") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Long") = False 'Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3", "Short Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Short Fillet") = True Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 6") = False
Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type E-F") = True Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type F") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type E-F Fillet") = True Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Type F Move") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Type F") = False
'LHC FRAME Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Secondary") = True Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 2") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Base Side") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Third") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Type B Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Type A Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Slot") = False Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4") = True Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 3") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 3", "Long Fillet") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 3", "Long Chamfer") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 3", "Long") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4", "Long Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4", "Long Chamfer") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4", "Long") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 3", "Short Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4", "Short Fillet") = True Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 6") = False
Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Type E-F") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Type F") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Type E-F Fillet") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4", "Type F") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4", "Type F Move") = False
'FRAME TOP HORIZONTAL Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1") = True Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 2") = False Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 3") = False Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4") = True Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 6") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Secondary") = True Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Base Side") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Third") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Type B Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Type A Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Slot") = False 'Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 3", "Long Fillet") = False 'Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 3", "Long Chamfer") = False 'Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 3", "Long") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4", "Long Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4", "Long Chamfer") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4", "Long") = False 'Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 3", "Short Fillet") = True Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4", "Short Fillet") = True
Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Type E-F") = True Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Type F") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Type E-F Fillet") = True Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4", "Type F") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4", "Type F Move") = False
End Sub
Sub NoAcroTypeF() FinishAdj() Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "Frame_Adj") = 57 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorAlOffset") = 20 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "AlcThk")=18 'RHC FRAME If Mid(door_configuration,1,2) = "SA" Then If Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "WallThk") - CalcDoorThickness - 0.5 - (2*FrameAcrovynThk)-57 +10-DoorAcrovynAdj< 12 Then Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopThk")= Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "WallThk") - CalcDoorThickness - 0.5 - (2*FrameAcrovynThk)+10-DoorAcrovynAdj-12 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorOffset") = ((Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "WallThk")/2)+10)-DoorAcrovynAdj Else Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopThk")= 57 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorOffset") = (Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "WallThk")/2) End If End If If Mid(door_configuration,1,2) = "DA" Then Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DoorOffset") = CalcDoorThickness/2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "StopThk")=57 End If Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1") = True Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Secondary") = True Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 2") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Base Side") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Third") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type B Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type A Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Slot") = False Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4") = True Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3") = False 'Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3", "Long Fillet") = False 'Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3", "Long Chamfer") = False 'Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3", "Long") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Long Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Long Chamfer") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Long") = False 'Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 3", "Short Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Short Fillet") = True Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 6") = False
Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type E-F") = True Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type F") = True Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 1", "Type E-F Fillet") = True Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Type F") = True Feature.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 4", "Type F Move") = True
'LHC FRAME Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Secondary") = True Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 2") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Base Side") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Third") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Type B Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Type A Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Slot") = False Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4") = True Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 3") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 3", "Long Fillet") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 3", "Long Chamfer") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 3", "Long") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4", "Long Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4", "Long Chamfer") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4", "Long") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 3", "Short Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4", "Short Fillet") = True Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 6") = False
Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Type E-F") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Type F") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 1", "Type E-F Fillet") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4", "Type F") = True Feature.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 4", "Type F Move") = True
'FRAME TOP HORIZONTAL Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1") = True Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 2") = False Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 3") = False Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4") = True Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 6") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Secondary") = True Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Base Side") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Third") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Type B Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Type A Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Slot") = False 'Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 3", "Long Fillet") = False 'Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 3", "Long Chamfer") = False 'Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 3", "Long") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4", "Long Fillet") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4", "Long Chamfer") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4", "Long") = False 'Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 3", "Short Fillet") = True Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4", "Short Fillet") = True
Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Type E-F") = True Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Type F") = True Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 1", "Type E-F Fillet") = True Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4", "Type F") = True Feature.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 4", "Type F Move") = True
End Sub
'#################################################
Sub FinishAdj()
Select Case door_finish Case "Acrovyn" DoorAcrovynAdj = 0 Case "Lacquered" DoorAdj() Case "Unfinished" DoorAdj() End Select
Select Case frame_finish Case "Acrovyn" FrameAcrovynAdj = 0 If Mid(door_configuration,1,2) = "SA" Then SA() If Mid(door_configuration,1,2) = "DA" Then DA() Case "Lacquered" FrameAdj() 'FrameAcrovynAdj = acrovyn_thickness Case "Unfinished" FrameAdj() 'FrameAcrovynAdj = acrovyn_thickness End Select
End Sub
Sub DoorAdj() Select Case door_type Case "DT01" DoorAcrovynAdj = 2 *acrovyn_thickness Case "DT02" DoorAcrovynAdj = 2 *acrovyn_thickness Case "DT03" DoorAcrovynAdj = 2 *acrovyn_thickness Case "DT04" DoorAcrovynAdj = 2 *acrovyn_thickness Case "DT05" DoorAcrovynAdj = 4 *acrovyn_thickness Case "DT06" DoorAcrovynAdj = 2 *acrovyn_thickness Case "DT07" DoorAcrovynAdj = 2 *acrovyn_thickness Case "DT08" DoorAcrovynAdj = 2 *acrovyn_thickness Case "DT09" DoorAcrovynAdj = 4 *acrovyn_thickness Case "DT10" DoorAcrovynAdj = 2 *acrovyn_thickness Case "DT11" DoorAcrovynAdj = 4 *acrovyn_thickness Case "DT12" FrameAcrovynAdj = 2 *acrovyn_thickness End Select
End Sub
Sub FrameAdj() FrameAcrovynAdj = acrovyn_thickness If Mid(door_configuration,1,2) = "SA" Then ADJSA() If Mid(door_configuration,1,2) = "DA" Then ADJDA() End Sub
Sub DA()
Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 5") = False Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 5") = False Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 5") = False Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH ACROVYN 5") = False Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH ACROVYN 5") = False Component.IsActive("FRAME H ACROVYN 5") = False End Sub
Sub ADJDA()
Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 5") = False Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 5") = False Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 5") = False 'Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH ACROVYN 5") = False 'Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH ACROVYN 5") = False 'Component.IsActive("FRAME H ACROVYN 5") = False End Sub
Sub SA()
Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 5") = True Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 5") = True Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 5") = True Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH ACROVYN 5") = True Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH ACROVYN 5") = True Component.IsActive("FRAME H ACROVYN 5") = True End Sub
Sub ADJSA()
Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH VERT 5") = True Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH VERT 5") = True Component.IsActive("FRAME HORIZONTAL 5") = True 'Component.IsActive("LHC FRAME RH ACROVYN 5") = False 'Component.IsActive("RHC FRAME LH ACROVYN 5") = False 'Component.IsActive("FRAME H ACROVYN 5") = False End Sub

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: SIDE PANELS
Rule.Text:
Sub Main()
Select Case frame_type Case "Type A" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MullionThk") = wall_thickness Case "Type B" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MullionThk") = wall_thickness Case "Type C" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MullionThk") = wall_thickness Case "Type D" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MullionThk") = wall_thickness Case "Type E" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MullionThk") = wall_thickness + Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "AlcThk") + FrameAcrovynThk Case "Type F" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "MullionThk") = wall_thickness + Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "AlcThk") + FrameAcrovynThk End Select
SidePanel_Type()
Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" SideEndLH() SideEndRH() Case "UNPR LH" SideEndLH() SideEndRH() Case "UNPR RH" SideEndLH() SideEndRH() Case "LH" SideEndLH() Case "RH" SideEndRH() End Select
Dim OverPanelDim = 0 Dim SidePanelDim = 0 If OverPanel = "Yes" Then OverPanelDim = 1 If SidePanel = "Yes" Then SidePanelDim = 2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "PanelDWG") = OverPanelDim + SidePanelDim
'Switch between full height ans split side panel. Select Case SidePanel Case "Yes" Select Case SidePanelSide Case "Both" If SidePanelSplit = 0 Then Parameter("SIDE PANEL LH ACROVYN ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=0 Parameter("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=0 Parameter("SIDE PANEL RH ACROVYN ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=0 Parameter("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelSplit")=Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelH")-((Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LPanelH"))/2) Else Parameter("SIDE PANEL LH ACROVYN ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=1 Parameter("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=1 Parameter("SIDE PANEL RH ACROVYN ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=1 Parameter("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelSplit")=SidePanelSplit End If Case "LH" If SidePanelSplit = 0 Then Parameter("SIDE PANEL LH ACROVYN ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=0 Parameter("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelSplit")=Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelH")-((Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LPanelH"))/2) Else Parameter("SIDE PANEL LH ACROVYN ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=1 Parameter("FRAME SIDE PANEL LH ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelSplit")=SidePanelSplit End If Case "RH" If SidePanelSplit = 0 Then Parameter("SIDE PANEL RH ACROVYN ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=0 Parameter("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelSplit")=Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelH")-((Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LPanelH"))/2) Else Parameter("SIDE PANEL RH ACROVYN ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=1 Parameter("FRAME SIDE PANEL RH ASSY", "FullSidePanel")=1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelSplit")=SidePanelSplit End If End Select Case "No" End Select
iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True End Sub
Sub SidePanel_Type() If SidePanelType = "Type 1" Then Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelTypeSuppress") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "PanelDepth")=96 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LPanelH")=57 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SideSpace")=FrameAcrovynThk 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "Glass")=7 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "GlassGap")=14 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelGlassThk")=7 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "BatonW") = 18 SideSpace = 0 Else Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelTypeSuppress") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "PanelDepth")=DoorCoreT Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SideSpace")=0.01 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LPanelH")=100 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "Glass")=12 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "GlassGap")=19 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelGlassThk")=12 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "BatonW") = (DoorCoreT-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SidePanelGlassThk")+7+(2*FrameAcrovynThk))/2 SideSpace = FrameAcrovynThk End If End Sub
Sub SideEndLH() Select Case frame_type Case "Type A" 'Parameter("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "EndRad") = 2+FrameAcrovynThk
'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = True 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = True 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = True 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = True Case "Type B" 'Parameter("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "EndRad") = 6+FrameAcrovynThk 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = False 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = False 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = False 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = False Case "Type C" 'Parameter("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "EndRad") = 6+FrameAcrovynThk 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = False 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = False 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = False 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = False Case "Type D" 'Parameter("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "EndRad") = 2+FrameAcrovynThk 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = True 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = True 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = True 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = True End Select
End Sub
Sub SideEndRH() Select Case frame_type Case "Type A" 'Parameter("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "EndRad") = 2+FrameAcrovynThk 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = True 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = True 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = True 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = True Case "Type B" 'Parameter("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "EndRad") = 6+FrameAcrovynThk 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = False 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = False 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = False 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = False Case "Type C" 'Parameter("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "EndRad") = 6+FrameAcrovynThk 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = False 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = False 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = False 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = False Case "Type D" 'Parameter("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "EndRad") = 2+FrameAcrovynThk 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = True 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME LH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = True 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad") = True 'Feature.IsActive("SIDE PANEL FRAME RH VERTICAL", "End Rad Mirror") = True End Select
End Sub

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: VISION PANELS
Rule.Text:
Sub Main() 'variable assignment to reduce string values/dependencies: 'Filenames SkeletonPartName = "DOOR SKELETON" LeftHandDoorAssemblyName = "LHC DOOR ASSY" RightHandDoorAssemblyName = "RHC DOOR ASSY" 'Parameters VPSealParameterName = "VPSeal" VPGlassThkParameterName = "VPGlassThk" VPBaParameterName = "VPBa" VPBbParameterName = "VPBb" VPBcParameterName = "VPBc" VPBdParameterName = "VPBd" VPBeParameterName = "VPBe" VPBfParameterName = "VPBf" VPBgParameterName = "VPBg" VPBhParameterName = "VPBh" VPBiParameterName = "VPBi" VPBjParameterName = "VPBj" VPBkParameterName = "VPBk" VPBlParameterName = "VPBl" VPBmParameterName = "VPBm" VPG1ParameterName = "VPG1" VPG2ParameterName = "VPG2" VPG3ParameterName = "VPG3" VPGPosParameterName = "VPGPos" VPBTypeParameterName = "VPBType"
VisionPanel1ParameterValue = "VP 1" VisionPanel2ParameterValue = "VP 2" VisionPanel3ParameterValue = "VP 3" VisionPanel4ParameterValue = "VP 4" VisionPanel5ParameterValue = "VP 5" VisionPanel6ParameterValue = "VP 6" VisionPanel7ParameterValue = "VP 7" VisionPanel8ParameterValue = "VP 8" VisionPanel9ParameterValue = "VP 9"
Clean1ParameterName = "Clean1" Clean2ParameterName = "Clean2"
Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" RHCBeadType() LHCBeadType() Case "UNPR RH" RHCBeadType() Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_LH") = 0 Case "UNPR LH" LHCBeadType() Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_RH") = 0 Case "RH" RHCBeadType() Case "LH" LHCBeadType() End Select
Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_A") = VP1_A Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_C") = VP1_C Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_X") = VP1_X Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_Y") = VP1_Y Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_Y1") = VP1_Y1 Select Case vision_panel_type Case VisionPanel1ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_B") = ((Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHCDoorW") + (2 * DoorAcrovynThk)) - (VP1_X)) / 2 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "Hor_Section_Height") = VP1_A + (VP1_Y / 2) + DoorBottomGap Case VisionPanel2ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_B") = ((Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHCDoorW") + (2 * DoorAcrovynThk)) - (VP1_X)) / 2 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "Hor_Section_Height") = VP1_A + (VP1_Y / 2) + DoorBottomGap Case VisionPanel3ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_B") = VP1_B Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "Hor_Section_Height") = VP1_A + (VP1_Y / 2) + DoorBottomGap Case VisionPanel4ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_B") = VP1_B Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "Hor_Section_Height") = VP1_A + (VP1_Y / 2) + DoorBottomGap Case VisionPanel5ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_B") = VP1_B Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "Hor_Section_Height") = VP1_A + (VP1_Y / 2) + DoorBottomGap Case VisionPanel6ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_B") = VP1_B Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "Hor_Section_Height") = VP1_A + DoorBottomGap Case VisionPanel7ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_B") = VP1_B Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "Hor_Section_Height") = VP1_A + DoorBottomGap Case VisionPanel8ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_B") = VP1_B Case VisionPanel9ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "RHC_B") = VP1_B End Select
Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "LHC_A") = VP1_A Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "LHC_C") = VP1_C Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "LHC_X") = VP1_X Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "LHC_Y") = VP1_Y Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "LHC_Y1") = VP1_Y1 Select Case vision_panel_type Case VisionPanel1ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "LHC_B") = ((Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "LHCDoorW") + (2 * DoorAcrovynThk)) - (VP1_X)) / 2 Case VisionPanel2ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "LHC_B") = ((Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "LHCDoorW") + (2 * DoorAcrovynThk)) - (VP1_X)) / 2 Case Else 'covers VP 3 thru' VP 9 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "LHC_B") = VP1_B End Select
Select Case vision_panel_beading_type Case "Bead 1" Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean1ParameterName) = 0 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean2ParameterName) = 0 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBTypeParameterName) = 1 Case "Bead 2" Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean1ParameterName) = 0 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean2ParameterName) = 0 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBTypeParameterName) = 2 Case "Bead 3" Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean1ParameterName) = 0 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean2ParameterName) = 0 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBTypeParameterName) = 3 Case "Bead 4" Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBTypeParameterName) = 4 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean1ParameterName) = Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBbParameterName) + Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBhParameterName) + Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBgParameterName) + DoorAcrovynThk Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean2ParameterName) = Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBbParameterName) + Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBhParameterName) + Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBgParameterName) + DoorAcrovynThk Case "Bead 5" Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBTypeParameterName) = 5 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean1ParameterName) = Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBbParameterName) + Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBhParameterName) + Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBgParameterName) + DoorAcrovynThk Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean2ParameterName) = Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBbParameterName) + Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBhParameterName) + Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBgParameterName) + DoorAcrovynThk Case "Bead 6" Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBTypeParameterName) = 6 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean1ParameterName) = 0 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean2ParameterName) = 0 Case "Bead 7" Parameter(SkeletonPartName, VPBTypeParameterName) = 7 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean1ParameterName) = 0 Parameter(SkeletonPartName, Clean2ParameterName) = 0 Case "Bead 8" 'Added by AF. Dec 2015 - VP7RHC Instance Component.IsActive("RHC VP7 GLASS CR1") = False Component.IsActive("RHC VP7 GLASS CR2") = False Parameter("RHC VP7 GLASS", "BD6") = 0 SetBead8() End Select End Sub
Sub VP7LHC() 'Vision Panels Type 6 & 7 Component.IsActive("LHC VP 67 ASSY") = True Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP7PN_LHC") = VP1_N Parameter(LeftHandDoorAssemblyName, "VP7PN") = VP1_N Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP7Pitch_LHC") = Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "LHC_C") Parameter(LeftHandDoorAssemblyName, "VP7Pitch") = Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "LHC_C") 'Vision Panels Type 1,3 And 5 Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 ASSY") = False Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP5PN_LHC") = 1 Parameter(LeftHandDoorAssemblyName, "VP5PN") = 1 'Vision Panels Type 2 And 4 Component.IsActive("LHC VP4 ASSY") = False
Select Case vision_panel_beading_type Case "Bead 1" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR1") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR2") = False Parameter("LHC VP7 GLASS", "BD6") = 0 SetBead1() Case "Bead 2" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR1") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR2") = False Parameter("LHC VP7 GLASS", "BD6") = 0 SetBead2() Case "Bead 3" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR1") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR2") = False Parameter("LHC VP7 GLASS", "BD6") = 0 SetBead3() Case "Bead 4" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR1") = True Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR2") = True Parameter("LHC VP7 GLASS", "BD6") = 0 SetBead4() Case "Bead 5" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR1") = True Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR2") = True Parameter("LHC VP7 GLASS", "BD6") = 0 SetBead5() Case "Bead 6" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR1") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR2") = False If Mid(fire_rating, 1, 4) = "FD60" Then Parameter("LHC VP7 GLASS", "BD6") = 6 Else Parameter("LHC VP7 GLASS", "BD6") = 0 End If SetBead6() Case "Bead 7" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR1") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR2") = False Parameter("LHC VP7 GLASS", "BD6") = 0 SetBead7() Case "Bead 8" 'Added by AF. Dec 2015 - VP7LHC Instance Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR1") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 GLASS CR2") = False Parameter("LHC VP7 GLASS", "BD6") = 0 SetBead8() End Select End Sub
'########################## '##########################
Sub RHCBeadType() Select Case vision_panel_type Case "None" Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_RH") = 0 Case VisionPanel1ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_RH") = 1 Case VisionPanel2ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_RH") = 2 Case VisionPanel3ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_RH") = 3 Case VisionPanel4ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_RH") = 4 Case VisionPanel5ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_RH") = 5 Case VisionPanel6ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_RH") = 6 Case VisionPanel7ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_RH") = 7 Case VisionPanel8ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_RH") = 3 Case VisionPanel9ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_RH") = 3 End Select
End Sub
Sub LHCBeadType() Select Case vision_panel_type Case "None" Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_LH") = 0 Case VisionPanel1ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_LH") = 1 Case VisionPanel2ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_LH") = 2 Case VisionPanel3ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_LH") = 3 Case VisionPanel4ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_LH") = 4 Case VisionPanel5ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_LH") = 5 Case VisionPanel6ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_LH") = 6 Case VisionPanel7ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_LH") = 7 Case VisionPanel8ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_LH") = 3 Case VisionPanel9ParameterValue Parameter(SkeletonPartName, "VP_Type_LH") = 3 End Select
End Sub

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: VISION PANEL ACROVYN
Rule.Text:
Sub Main() If door_finish = "Acrovyn" Then VPDoorAcroYes() iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True End Sub
Sub VPDoorAcroYes() Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" VPLH() VPRH() Case "UNPR LH" VPLH() NoRHC() Case "UNPR RH" NoLHC() VPRH() Case "LH" VPLH() Case "RH" VPRH() End Select
End Sub
Sub VPLH() Select Case vision_panel_type Case "None" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 1") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 2") = False Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP7PN")=1 'VP 5 Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 3") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 4") = False Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP5PN")=1 'VP 4 Component.IsActive("LHC VP4 BEAD ACROVYN 3") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP4 BEAD ACROVYN 4") = False Case "VP 1" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 1") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 2") = False Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP7PN")=1 'VP 5 Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 3") = True Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 4") = True Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP5PN")=1 'VP 4 Component.IsActive("LHC VP4 BEAD ACROVYN 3") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP4 BEAD ACROVYN 4") = False Case "VP 2" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 1") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 2") = False Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP7PN")=1 'VP 5 Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 3") = True Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 4") = True Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP5PN")=1 'VP 4 Component.IsActive("LHC VP4 BEAD ACROVYN 3") = True Component.IsActive("LHC VP4 BEAD ACROVYN 4") = True Case "VP 3" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 1") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 2") = False Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP7PN")=1 'VP 5 Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 3") = True Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 4") = True Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP5PN")=1 'VP 4 Component.IsActive("LHC VP4 BEAD ACROVYN 3") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP4 BEAD ACROVYN 4") = False Case "VP 4" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 1") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 2") = False Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP7PN")=1 'VP 5 Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 3") = True Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 4") = True Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP5PN")=1 'VP 4 Component.IsActive("LHC VP4 BEAD ACROVYN 3") = True Component.IsActive("LHC VP4 BEAD ACROVYN 4") = True Case "VP 5" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 1") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 2") = False Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP7PN")=1 'VP 5 Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 3") = True Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 4") = True Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP5PN")= VP1_N Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP5Pitch")=Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHC_Y") + Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHC_C") 'VP 4 Component.IsActive("LHC VP4 BEAD ACROVYN 3") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP4 BEAD ACROVYN 4") = False Case "VP 6" Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 1") = True Component.IsActive("LHC VP7 BEAD ACROVYN 2") = True Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP7PN")=1 'VP 5 Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 3") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP5 BEAD ACROVYN 4") = False Parameter("LHC DOOR ACROVYN ASSY", "VP5PN")=1 'VP 4
