= True Constraint.IsActive("LHC HINGE 4a", "Mate:7")= True Constraint.IsActive("LHC HINGE 4a", "Insert:7")= True Select Case HingePosition Case "Equal" FOURhingeEQ() Case "Offset" FOURhingeOFFSET() End Select End Select Case "CS 02" Constraint.IsActive("LHC HINGE 1a", "Mate:8")= False Constraint.IsActive("LHC HINGE 1a", "Insert:8")= False Component.IsActive("LHC HINGE 1a") = False Constraint.IsActive("LHC HINGE 2a", "Mate:5")= False Constraint.IsActive("LHC HINGE 2a", "Insert:5")= False Component.IsActive("LHC HINGE 2a") = False Constraint.IsActive("LHC HINGE 3a", "Mate:6")= Constraint.IsActive("LHC HINGE 4", "Mate:4")= False Constraint.IsActive("LHC HINGE 4", "Insert:4")= False Component.IsActive("LHC HINGE 4") = False Select Case HingePosition Case "Equal" THREEhingeEQ() Case "Offset" THREEhingeOFFSET() End Select Case 4 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "No_Hinges") = 4 Component.IsActive("LHC HINGE 1") = True Constraint.IsActive("LHC HINGE 1", "Mate:1")= Sub THREEhingeEQ() 'HINGE POSIION VALUES Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeTop") = 250 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeBottom") = 250 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeMidTop") = (door_height/2)-Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeTop") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeMidBottom") = 250 'HINGE CUTOUT SUPPRESSION RHC If SidePanel = "Yes" Then Select Case SidePanelSide Case "Both" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRH") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRHInt") = 1 Case "LH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRHInt") = 0 Case "RH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRH") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRHInt") = 1 End Select Else Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRHInt") = 0 Case "LH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRH") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRHInt") = 0 Case "RH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRHInt") = 0 Case "UNPR LH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRHInt") = 0 Case "UNPR RH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPRHInt") = 0 End Select End If 'HINGE CUTOUT SUPPRESSION LHC If SidePanel = "Yes" Then Select Case SidePanelSide Case "Both" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLH") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLHInt") = 1 Case "LH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLHInt") = 0 Case "RH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLH") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLHInt") = 1 End Select Else Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLHInt") = 0 Case "LH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLHInt") = 0 Case "RH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLH") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLHInt") = 0 Case "UNPR LH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLHInt") = 0 Case "UNPR RH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLHInt") = 0 End Select End If
End Sub

0 Case "UNPR RH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLH") = 2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "HingeSPLHInt") = 0 End Select End If

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: INTUMESCENT
Rule.Text:
Sub Main() Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" IntLH() IntRH() Case "UNPR LH" IntLH() IntRH() Case "UNPR RH" IntLH() IntRH() Case "LH" IntLH() Case "RH" IntRH() End Select
Select Case OverPanel Case "Yes" Select Case fire_rating Case "FD30" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameOP") = 2 Case "FD30S" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameOP") = 2 Case "FD60" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameOP") = 1 Case "FD60S" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameOP") = 1 Case "NFR" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameOP") = 2 End Select Case "No" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameOP") = 0 End Select
Select Case SidePanel Case "Yes" Select SidePanelSide Case "Both" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPLH") = 1 ul Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPRH") = 1 ul Case "LH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPLH") = 1 ul Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPRH") = 0 ul Case "RH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPLH") = 0 ul Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPRH") = 1 ul End Select Case "No" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPLH") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPRH") = 0 End Select
If Mid(dim_spec,1,1) = "F" Then ElseIf Mid(dim_spec,1,1) = "D" Then ElseIf Mid(dim_spec,1,1) = "O" Then Select Case fire_rating Case "NFR" Component.IsActive("FRAME INTUMESCENT") = False Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPLH") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPRH")= 0 Case "FD30" Component.IsActive("FRAME INTUMESCENT") = False Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPLH") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPRH")= 0 Case "FD30S" Component.IsActive("FRAME INTUMESCENT") = False Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPLH") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPRH")= 0 Case "FD60" Component.IsActive("FRAME INTUMESCENT") = True Feature.IsActive("FRAME INTUMESCENT", "Intumescent Smoke Seal Brush") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME INTUMESCENT", "Intumescent Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = False Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPLH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPRH")= 1 Case "FD60S" Component.IsActive("FRAME INTUMESCENT") = True Select Case smoke_seal_type Case "Brush" Feature.IsActive("FRAME INTUMESCENT", "Intumescent Smoke Seal Brush") = True Feature.IsActive("FRAME INTUMESCENT", "Intumescent Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = False Case "Twin Fin" Feature.IsActive("FRAME INTUMESCENT", "Intumescent Smoke Seal Brush") = False Feature.IsActive("FRAME INTUMESCENT", "Intumescent Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = True End Select Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPLH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntFrameSPRH")= 1 End Select End If
iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True End Sub
'############################################################
Sub IntLH() Select Case fire_rating Case "NFR" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR INTUMESCENT") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = False Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 0 Case "FD30" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR INTUMESCENT") = True Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSTF")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSTF")=0 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Brush") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Twin") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = False Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 0 Case "FD30S" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR INTUMESCENT") = True Select Case smoke_seal_type Case "Brush" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSB")=1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSTF")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSTF")=0 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Brush") = True 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = False Case "Twin Fin" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSTF")=1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSTF")=0 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Brush") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = True End Select
Component.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = False Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 0 Case "FD60" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR INTUMESCENT") = False Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" Component.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = True Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSTF")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSTF")=0 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Brush") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = False
Case "UNPR LH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = True Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSTF")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSTF")=0 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Brush") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = False
Case "UNPR RH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = True Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSTF")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSTF")=0 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Brush") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = False Case "LH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = True Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSTF")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSTF")=0 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Brush") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = False Case "RH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = True Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 0 End Select Case "FD60S" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR INTUMESCENT") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = True
Select Case smoke_seal_type Case "Brush" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSTF")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSB")=1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSTF")=0 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Brush") = True 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = False Case "Twin Fin" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDSSTF")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "LHCDDSSTF")=1 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Brush") = False 'Feature.IsActive("LHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT", "LHC FD30S Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = True End Select
Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 1 End Select End Sub
'###########################################################################
Sub IntRH() Select Case fire_rating Case "NFR" Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR INTUMESCENT") = False Component.IsActive("RHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = False Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 0 Case "FD30" Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR INTUMESCENT") = True Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDSSTF")=0 'Feature.IsActive("RHC DOOR INTUMESCENT", "RHC FD30S Smoke Seal Brush") = False 'Feature.IsActive("RHC DOOR INTUMESCENT", "RHC FD30S Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = False Component.IsActive("RHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = False Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 0 Case "FD30S" Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR INTUMESCENT") = True Select Case smoke_seal_type Case "Brush" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDSSB")=1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDSSTF")=0 'Feature.IsActive("RHC DOOR INTUMESCENT", "RHC FD30S Smoke Seal Brush") = True 'Feature.IsActive("RHC DOOR INTUMESCENT", "RHC FD30S Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = False Case "Twin Fin" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDSSB")=0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "RHCDSSTF")=1 'Feature.IsActive("RHC DOOR INTUMESCENT", "RHC FD30S Smoke Seal Brush") = False 'Feature.IsActive("RHC DOOR INTUMESCENT", "RHC FD30S Smoke Seal Twin Fin") = True End Select
Component.IsActive("RHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = False Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 0 Case "FD60" Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR INTUMESCENT") = False Component.IsActive("RHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = True Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 1 Case "FD60S" Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR INTUMESCENT") = False Component.IsActive("RHC DOUBLE DOOR INTUMESCENT") = True Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "IntDD") = 1 End Select End Sub

Rule.Name: SIDE PANEL BEADING
Rule.Text:
Sub Main() Select Case OverPanel Case "Yes" panelbeading() Case "No" Select Case SidePanel Case "Yes" panelbeading() Case "No" End Select End Select
iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True End Sub
Sub panelbeading() Select Case SidePanelType Case "Type 1" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBSuppress") = 0 Case "Type 2" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBSuppress") = 1 End Select
Select Case panel_bead_type Case "Bead 1" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBType") = 1 Case "Bead 2" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBType") = 2 Case "Bead 3" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBType") = 3 Case "Bead 7" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBType") = 7 End Select spbeadsettings() End Sub
Sub spbeadsettings() Select Case panel_bead_type Case "Bead 1" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBSuppress") = 1 If DoorCoreT = 44 Then 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPSeal") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBa") = 18-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBb") = 17 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBc") = 2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBd") = 4 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBe") = 12.6 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBf") = 105 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBg") = 0.01 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBh") = 0.01 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBi") = 2.5 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBj") = 2 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBk") = 14 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBl") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBa") 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBm") = 25 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPGlassThk") = 7 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPG1") = 7 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPG2") = 4 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPG3") = 6 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPGPos") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBa") + Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBi") Else If DoorCoreT >= 54 Then 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPSeal") = 2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBa") = 19-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBb") = 25.6 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBc") = 2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBd") = 3 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBe") = 25.5 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBf") = 107 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBg") = 2 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBh") = 0.01 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBi") = 4 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBj") = 0.01 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBk") = 16 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBl") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBa") 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBm") = 25 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPGlassThk") = 12 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPG1") = 12 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPG2") = 4 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPG3") = 6 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPGPos") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBa") + Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBi") End If Case "Bead 2" If DoorCoreT = 44 Then 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPSeal") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBa") = 18 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBb") = 20-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBh") = 0.01 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBi") = 2.5 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBj") = 2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBk") = 14 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBl") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBa") - DoorAcrovynThk 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBm") = 25 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPGlassThk") = 7 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPG1") = 7 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPG2") = 4 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPG3") = 6 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPGPos") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBa") + Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBi")-DoorAcrovynThk Else If DoorCoreT >= 54 Then 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPSeal") = 2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBa") = 19.5 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBb") = 27-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBc") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBd") = 3 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBe") = 25.5 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBf") = 107 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBg") = 2 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBh") = 0.01 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBi") = 3.5 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBj") = 0.01 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBk") = 16 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBl") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", = 44 Then 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPSeal") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBa") = 18 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBb") = 20-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBc") = 6 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBd") = 4 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBe") = 12.6 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBf") = 105 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBg") = 0.01 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBh") = 0.01 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBi") = 2.5 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBj") = 2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBk") = 14 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBl") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBa") Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBe") = 25.5 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBf") = 107 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBg") = 2 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBh") = 0.01 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBi") 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPGPos") = Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBa") + Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPBi")-DoorAcrovynThk End If Case "Bead 7" If DoorCoreT = 44 Then 'Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "VPSeal") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBa") = 18-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBb") = 20-DoorAcrovynThk Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBc") = 8 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPBd") = Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: FRAME NOTCH
Rule.Text:
Sub Main() If Mid(dim_spec,1,1) = "O" Then VerticalNotches() HorizontalNotches() Else
End If iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True End Sub
Sub VerticalNotches() Select Case OverPanel Case "Yes" Select Case frame_type Case "Type A" Parameter("FRAME OVER PANEL HORIZONTAL", "d26") = 2 Case "Type D" Parameter("FRAME OVER PANEL HORIZONTAL", "d26") = 2 Case "Type E" Parameter("FRAME OVER PANEL HORIZONTAL", "d26") = 6 Case "Type F" Parameter("FRAME OVER PANEL HORIZONTAL", "d26") = 6 End Select
Select Case SidePanel Case "Yes" Select Case frame_type Case "Type A" Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 1", "d26") = 2 Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 1", "d37") = 2+FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 2", "d26") = 2 Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 2", "d37") = 2+FrameAcrovynThk Case "Type D" Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 1", "d26") = 2 Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 1", "d37") = 2+FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 2", "d26") = 2 Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 2", "d37") = 2+FrameAcrovynThk Case "Type E" Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 1", "d26") = 6 Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 1", "d37") = 6+FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 2", "d26") = 6 Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 2", "d37") = 6+FrameAcrovynThk Case "Type F" Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 1", "d26") = 6 Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 1", "d37") = 6+FrameAcrovynThk Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 2", "d26") = 6 Parameter("OVER PANEL FRAME ACROVYN 2", "d37") = 6+FrameAcrovynThk End Select
Select Case OverPanelWidth Case "Full" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelNotchSup") = 1 Case "Partial" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelNotchSup") = 2 End Select Case "No" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelNotchSup") = 1 End Select Case "No" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "OverPanelNotchSup") = 0 End Select End Sub
Sub HorizontalNotches() Select Case OverPanel Case "Yes" Select Case SidePanel Case "Yes" Select Case OverPanelWidth Case "Full" TransomNotches() Case "Partial" FrameHNotches() End Select Case "No" FrameHNotches() End Select Case "No" Select Case SidePanel Case "Yes" FrameHNotches() Case "No" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSupLH") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSUPRH") = 0 End Select End Select End Sub
Sub TransomNotches() Select Case SidePanelSide Case "Both" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSupLH") = 2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSUPRH") = 2 Case "LH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSupLH") = 2 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSUPRH") = 0 Case "RH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSupLH") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSUPRH") = 2 End Select End Sub
Sub FrameHNotches() Select Case SidePanelSide Case "Both" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSupLH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSUPRH") = 1 Case "LH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSupLH") = 1 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSUPRH") = 0 Case "RH" Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSupLH") = 0 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SPNotchSUPRH") = 1 End Select End Sub

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: HANDLES
Rule.Text:

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: DOOR SKETCH
Rule.Text:
If Mid(door_configuration,1,2) = "SA" Then Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SA") = 45 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DA") = 90 End If
If Mid(door_configuration,1,2) = "DA" Then Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "SA") = 45 Parameter("DOOR SKELETON", "DA") = 45 End If
iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: NO DOORS
Rule.Text:
Select Case door_fitted Case "Door Fitted" Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Case "UNPR LH" Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Case "UNPR RH" Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Case "LH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Case "RH" Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True End Select Case "No Door" Select Case door_handing Case "EQPR" Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = False Case "UNPR LH" Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = False Case "UNPR RH" Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = False Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = False Case "LH" Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = False Case "RH" Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = False End Select End Select
iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\Configuration Top Level Assembly.iam
Rule.Name: REGEN RULES
Rule.Text:
Sub Main()
Dummyvalue = Update
'NONE of these work as they should so attempting to fix the problem by calling the regenallrules command in our addin itself. 'Dim controlDef As ControlDefinition = ThisApplication.CommandManager.ControlDefinitions.Item("iLogic.RegenAllRules") 'controlDef.Execute2(True) 'Logger.Debug("controlDef.Execute2(True) fired") 'works but why? 'controlDef.Execute2(true) 'Logger.Debug("controlDef.Execute2(False) fired") 'controlDef.Execute 'Logger.Debug("controlDef.Execute fired in REGEN RULES")
If Component.IsActive("LHC DOOR ASSY") = True Then Select Case vision_panel_type Case "VP 1" VP135LHC() Case "VP 2" VP135LHC() VP24LHC() Case "VP 3" VP135LHC() Case "VP 4" VP135LHC() VP24LHC() Case "VP 5" VP135LHC() Case "VP 6" VP67LHC() Case "VP 7" VP67LHC() End Select End If
If Component.IsActive("RHC DOOR ASSY") = True Then Select Case vision_panel_type Case "VP 1" VP135RHC() Case "VP 2" VP135RHC() VP24RHC() Case "VP 3" VP135RHC() Case "VP 4" VP135RHC() VP24RHC() Case "VP 5" VP135RHC() Case "VP 6" VP67RHC() Case "VP 7" VP67RHC() End Select End If 'Next line added 2019-02-22 AF to counter the "surpriiise beading issue" present in UNPR (L/R)H configurations: iLogicVb.RunRule("VISION PANELS")
iLogicVb.RunRule("FINISH COLOUR")
iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True
End Sub
Sub VP135LHC() Dim VP135AssemblyNameLHC As String = ThisDoc.FileName(False) 'without extension ' Split string based on spaces Dim VP135namepartsLHC As String() = VP135AssemblyNameLHC.Split(New Char() {"-"c})
Dim VP135NameLHC As String If VP135namepartsLHC.Length = 1 Then VP135NameLHC = "LHC Vision Panel Type5 Assy.iam<ilogic>" Else 'Set LHC VP4 file name VP135NameLHC = VP135namepartsLHC(0)&"-LHC Vision Panel Type5 Assy-"&VP135namepartsLHC(2)&"-"&VP135namepartsLHC(3)&".iam<ilogic>" End If 'Replace LHCVP4 with ilogic LoD Component.Replace("LHC VP5 ASSY", VP135NameLHC, True) End Sub
Sub VP135RHC() Dim VP135AssemblyNameRHC As String = ThisDoc.FileName(False) 'without extension ' Split string based on spaces Dim VP135namepartsRHC As String() = VP135AssemblyNameRHC.Split(New Char() {"-"c})
Dim VP135NameRHC As String If VP135namepartsRHC.Length = 1 Then VP135NameRHC = "RHC Vision Panel Type5 Assy.iam<ilogic>" Else 'Set LHC VP4 file name VP135NameRHC = VP135namepartsRHC(0)&"-RHC Vision Panel Type5 Assy-"&VP135namepartsRHC(2)&"-"&VP135namepartsRHC(3)&".iam<ilogic>" End If 'Replace LHCVP4 with ilogic LoD Component.Replace("RHC VP5 ASSY", VP135NameRHC, True) End Sub
Sub VP24LHC() Dim VP24AssemblyNameLHC As String = ThisDoc.FileName(False) 'without extension ' Split string based on spaces Dim VP24namepartsLHC As String() = VP24AssemblyNameLHC.Split(New Char() {"-"c})
Dim VP24NameLHC As String If VP24namepartsLHC.Length = 1 Then VP24NameLHC = "LHC Vision Panel Type4 Assy.iam<ilogic>" Else 'Set LHC VP4 file name VP24NameLHC = VP24namepartsLHC(0)&"-LHC Vision Panel Type4 Assy-"&VP24namepartsLHC(2)&"-"&VP24namepartsLHC(3)&".iam<ilogic>" End If 'Replace LHCVP4 with ilogic LoD Component.Replace("LHC VP4 ASSY", VP24NameLHC, True) End Sub
Sub VP24RHC() Dim VP24AssemblyNameRHC As String = ThisDoc.FileName(False) 'without extension ' Split string based on spaces Dim VP24namepartsRHC As String() = VP24AssemblyNameRHC.Split(New Char() {"-"c})
Dim VP24NameRHC As String If VP24namepartsRHC.Length = 1 Then VP24NameRHC = "RHC Vision Panel Type4 Assy.iam<ilogic>" Else 'Set RHC VP4 file name VP24NameRHC = VP24namepartsRHC(0)&"-RHC Vision Panel Type4 Assy-"&VP24namepartsRHC(2)&"-"&VP24namepartsRHC(3)&".iam<ilogic>" End If 'Replace RHCVP4 with ilogic LoD Component.Replace("RHC VP4 ASSY", VP24NameRHC, True) End Sub
Sub VP67LHC() Dim VP67AssemblyNameLHC As String = ThisDoc.FileName(False) 'without extension ' Split string based on spaces Dim VP67namepartsLHC As String() = VP67AssemblyNameLHC.Split(New Char() {"-"c})
Dim VP67NameLHC As String If VP67namepartsLHC.Length = 1 Then VP67NameLHC = "LHC Vision Panel Type67 Assy" Else 'Set LHC VP4 file name VP67NameLHC = VP67namepartsLHC(0)&"-LHC Vision Panel Type67 Assy-"&VP67namepartsLHC(2)&"-"&VP67namepartsLHC(3)&".iam<ilogic>" End If 'Replace LHCVP4 with ilogic LoD Component.Replace("LHC VP 67 ASSY", VP67NameLHC, True) End Sub
Sub VP67RHC() Dim VP67AssemblyNameRHC As String = ThisDoc.FileName(False) 'without extension ' Split string based on spaces Dim VP67namepartsRHC As String() = VP67AssemblyNameRHC.Split(New Char() {"-"c})
Dim VP67NameRHC As String If VP67namepartsRHC.Length = 1 Then VP67NameRHC = "RHC Vision Panel Type67 Assy.iam<ilogic>" Else 'Set LHC VP4 file name VP67NameRHC = VP67namepartsRHC(0)&"-RHC Vision Panel Type67 Assy-"&VP67namepartsRHC(2)&"-"&VP67namepartsRHC(3)&".iam<ilogic>" End If 'Replace LHCVP4 with ilogic LoD Component.Replace("RHC VP 67 ASSY", VP67NameRHC, True) End Sub

Rule.Text:

Rule.ParentFileName: P:\Construction Specialties\CS Door Configurator 3D Data - 2019\Workspace\LHC Door Assy.iam
Rule.Name: Suppress Rule
Rule.Text:
Select Case AcrovynSuppress Case 0 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ACROVYN ASSY PATTERN") = False Case 1 Select Case VPSupp Case 0 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ACROVYN ASSY PATTERN") = False Case 1 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ACROVYN ASSY PATTERN") = False Case 2 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ACROVYN ASSY PATTERN") = False Case 3 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ACROVYN ASSY PATTERN") = False Case 4 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ACROVYN ASSY PATTERN") = False Case 5 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ACROVYN ASSY PATTERN") = False Case 6 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ACROVYN ASSY PATTERN") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD ACROVYN ASSY") = True Case 7 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ACROVYN ASSY PATTERN") = True End Select 'Component.IsActive("RHC VP BEAD ACRO ASSY PATTERN") = True 'Case 2 'Component.IsActive("RHC VP BEAD ACRO ASSY PATTERN") = False 'Component.IsActive("RHC VP BEAD ACROVYN ASSY") = True End Select
Select Case VPSupp Case 0 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ASSY PATTERN") = False Case 1 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ASSY PATTERN") = False Case 2 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ASSY PATTERN") = False Case 3 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ASSY PATTERN") = False Case 4 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ASSY PATTERN") = False Case 5 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ASSY PATTERN") = False Case 6 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ASSY PATTERN") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ASSY") = True Select Case BeadType Case "Bead 1" Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP2") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP1") = False Case "Bead 2" Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP2") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP1") = False Case "Bead 3" Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP2") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP1") = False Case "Bead 4" Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP2") = True Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP1") = True Case "Bead 5" Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP2") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP1") = False End Select Case 7 Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 5 ASSY PATTERN") = True Select Case BeadType Case "Bead 1" Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP2") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP1") = False Case "Bead 2" Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP2") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP1") = False Case "Bead 3" Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP2") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP1") = False Case "Bead 4" Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP2") = True Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP1") = True Case "Bead 5" Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP2") = False Component.IsActive("LHC VP BEAD 4 - HP1") = False End Select End Select
iLogicVb.UpdateWhenDone = True
